title: Command chaining operators are not allowed (;, &, |, `)
body:
Hi, came across this issue:

{
  `shell`: `powershell`,
  `command`: `[some powershell with a query paramater]' 'AzureDiagnostics | take 2'`
}

So when passing parameters like a kudo query in this case should allow the pipe character

I know i can disable that check globally, but that's risky.
author: BartNetJS

comments.body: Hi @SimonB97, thanks for the quick fix

satisfaction_conditions: A way to selectively allow specific command chaining operators for particular shell configurations
A security-conscious solution that doesn't compromise overall injection protection
A configuration-based approach that doesn't require code changes
